mapper.select: select diningcode, diningname from dining where hotelcode in (select hotelcode from hotel where id=#{id})

SELECT db.bookingcode, db.id, db.bookingname, db.pplcnt, ds.category, db.BOOKINGDATE, db.STATUS FROM DINING d INNER JOIN DININGSCHEDULE ds ON d.diningcode = ds.diningcode INNER JOIN DININGBOOKING db ON ds.schedulecode = db.schedulecode INNER JOIN hotel h ON d.hotelcode = h.hotelcode WHERE h.id = #{id}
